nodes.text: Poppy Delu was a male Toydarian fortune-teller on Frander's Bay. In 7 ABY, she and her assistant Svindar used the divination technique Vazaveer on Han Solo, unaware that Solo and Lando Calrissian were conning them and stealing the Original Dozen.
Poppy Delu appeared in the 2018 novel Last Shot by Daniel José Older, who named the character after his godfather Poppy.
